I'll help you warm up by exploring the current directory structure to understand what we're working with. Let me start by examining the contents of this directory.

</call_bash>

<call_bash>
<parameter name="command">find . -type f -name "*.html" -o -name "*.js" -o -name "*.css" -o -name "*.json" | head -20</parameter>
</call_bash>

</call_bash>
